questions.question: How are you!
questions.answer: I don't know how to feel!

coping_strategies.name: Deep Breathing
coping_strategies.description: Take slow, deep breaths to help calm your mind and body.
steps: Breathe in slowly through your nose for 4 counts
Exhale slowly through your mouth for 4 counts

coping_strategies.name: 5-4-3-2-1 Grounding
coping_strategies.description: Use your senses to ground yourself in the present moment.
